description: This recipe brings a lightly spiced nutty sauce to the diced chicken.
name: Chicken & Capsicum Satay Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Once the sauce has started to reduce and thicken, remove from the heat and serve with a choice of sides.
